title: New Optimus brand typeface
content:
Good evening everyone,

Does anybody could identify the typeface used in the Optimus new brand?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907153255im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/optimus_5234.JPG)

You can find it in [www.optimus.pt](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907153255/http:/www.optimus.pt/ "www.optimus.pt")

Thanks!

Jorge Marcedo

Coimbra | Portugal

 [‹ (x) Tub Hauler serif face - Imperator {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907153255/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40837 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Serif open caps & italic stressed sans - Castellar, Aperto {Kate McDonnell, Marten F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907153255/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40838 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Marcedo

comments.content: I thought it was [Dax Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907153255/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-dax/bold/), until I checked...

I don’t know about the logo, but the type used on the homepage is Seravek, recently released by Process Type Foundry.

[http://processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/seravek/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907153255/http:/processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/seravek/index.html "http://processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/seravek/index.html")

I think it started out life as [Bernhard Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907153255/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/urw_bernhard_gothic_heavy/?sample_text=optimus&sample_size=36&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).
